name: SqueeDogs: Be a Puppy PI! Adventure, Customize and Share!
blurb: Join other SqueeDogs as a new Puppy Private Investigator to solve mysteries, sniff out goodies and rescue lost puppies!

rewards.reward: THE EARLY BIRD CATCHES THE WORM.  THE EARLY DOG CATCHES THE . . . BETA?!\r\n\r\nGet early access to our Beta in March!
YOU'RE IN THE DOGHOUSE!\r\n\r\nWe\u2019ll add your name to a wall of doghouse graffiti...err, artwork as a special thanks! Ruff, ruff!  AND Early access to our Beta.

"THERE ARE THREE FAITHFUL FRIENDS - AN OLD WIFE, AN OLD DOG AND READY MONEY."  --Benjamin Franklin-- \r\n\r\nWe can\u2019t give you a wife, but we can give you a dog and some money!  Get bonus SqueeCash when you start playing SqueeDogs!  AND Early access to our Beta.

WORKING LIKE A DOG! \r\n\r\nSuggest a mission for our doggy detectives.  We'll sneak you in the back door to the doggy developers' workshop and listen to your idea for a secret mission! AND Early access to our Beta.

THE HAIR OF THE DOG!\r\n\r\nWe\u2019re not talking about the hangover cure...we\u2019re talking about the actual hair of your SqueeDog!  Receive a code to unlock decals and pelts reserved for "Kickstarters"! AND Early access to our Beta.
HOT DIGGITY DOG!\r\n\r\nBe the hottest dog on the block when you dress your doggy character in special items reserved for "Founders"! AND Early access to our Beta.
TOP DOG!\r\n\r\nImpress your friends (and foes!) with incredible outfits and items!  Get all items in game unlocked when you first start playing! AND Early access to our Beta.

\u201cON THE INTERNET, NO ONE KNOWS YOU'RE A DOG\u201d --New Yorker Cartoon--\r\n\r\nNow, everyone will know you\u2019re THE dog when you get a custom computer desktop background made from our game\u2019s concept art! AND Early access to our Beta.

\u201cBULLDOGS ARE ADORABLE, WITH FACES LIKE TOADS THAT HAVE BEEN SAT ON\u201d --Collete--                                 \r\n\r\nWe don\u2019t care what you look like!  Send us an image and it will end up in our game!  This could be a picture of you, your dog, anything!  Just make sure that it is not obscene, copyrighted or otherwise offensive.  We will send more details on images specs!  AND Early access to our Beta.

PAWsies UP!\r\n\r\nGet a puppy paws up, or two or even three, when your doggy character gets a special decal designed just for him by his best friend. Make it funny, meaningful, anything you want.  Send us an image and we will turn it into a decal that you (or anyone) can place on your character!  This could be your name, a picture of your dog, anything!  Just make sure that it is not obscene, copyrighted or otherwise offensive.  We will send more details on images specs!  AND Early access to our Beta.

\u201cTHE LITTLE DOG LAUGHED TO SEE SUCH FUN\u201d --The Cat & the Fiddle--\r\n\r\nLOL when you see the image/idea you send for a wearable accessory on your doggy character! This could be your name, a picture of your dog, anything!  Just make sure that it is not obscene, copyrighted or otherwise offensive.  We will send more details on images specs!  AND Early access to our Beta.

EVERY DOG HAS ITS DAY!\r\n\r\nToday is YOUR dog\u2019s day.  Send us a screenshot of your customized dog and we will feature it as a SqueeDog on loading screens or our website or in-game. AND Early access to our Beta.

THE BIG DOG!\r\n\r\nBe a BIG dog by having our artists customize your doggy character in full gear featuring your business, company or personal logo in-game or on a loading screen. AND any of the other REWARDS!
